data.why:
Time::ProseClock -- an alternative to conventional digital and
    analog time displays. Instantiante the object and print
    $obj->display() to show the time as as a typical colloquial English
    expression. An optional argument to the display method can show a
    user-defined time instead of default localtime(). Please read the
    POD for more detail.

    Thank you,

    Gerald Gold
